props.Description: Target unit receives {1} Fire damage plus 2% per point of Throw Mastery and gets {2} Blaze counters.
props.Dev_Notes: Roll of attack*throw mastery vs defense? Cell will receive double amount of Blaze counters.
props.Name: Fire Bomb

props.Description: Restores {1} Essence. Contains {this_charges} charges.
props.Name: Essence Potion

props.Description: Increases Spellpower by {1} for {2} turns. Contains {this_charges} charges. The effect may stack any number of times.
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Simple Const(Increased Spellpower,Spellpower,5)
props.Name: Catalyst Potion

props.Description: Restores {1} Endurance. Contains {this_charges} charges.
props.Name: Healing Potion

props.Description: Restores {1} Stamina. Contains {this_charges} charges.
props.Name: Stamina Potion

props.Description: Restores {1} Focus. Contains {this_charges} charges.
props.Name: Focus Potion

props.Description: Adds {1} Poison counters to a chosen weapon, which will then be applied to targets upon successful attacks, with maximum depending on damage dealt, weapon type and hero's skills. Throwing weapons apply 5x times more counters and ranged weapons (use on ammo) - 2x.
props.Name: Poison Coating

props.Description: Target unit receives {1} Poison damage and gets {2} Poison counters.
props.Name: Venom Bomb

props.Description: Grants Flying status that affects Attack and Defense in melee combat and reduces all Move action costs by half.
props.Name: Levitation Elixir

props.Description: Restores {1} Toughness. Contains {this_charges} charges.
props.Name: Fortifying Potion

props.Description: Create a minor haze cloud at whatever spot thrown at, adding {1} Concealment to the cell and any unit standing on it.
props.Name: Liquid Shade

props.Description: Temporarily reduces Concealment of the target cell and whatever object it holds by {1} plus 2% per point of Throw Mastery.
props.Name: Liquid Light

props.Description: Applies Dispel {1} and Silence {2} to the hero.
props.Name: Void Elixir

props.Description: Boosts your Initiative by {1}.
props.Name: Celerity Elixir

props.Description: Reduces target's Stamina by 1 for every 10 Poison counters it has each turn. Adds {1} Poison counters to a chosen weapon, which will then be applied to targets upon successful attacks, with maximum depending on damage dealt, weapon type and hero's skills. Throwing weapons apply 5x times more counters and ranged weapons (use on ammo) - 2x.
props.Name: Weakening Poison

props.Description: Adds {1} Rage counters, each increasing your Spellpower and Damage by 5% while reducing your Defense by the same amount. Excess of Rage may lead to Berserk behavior... Thankfully, one counter is removed each turn.
props.Name: Fury Elixir

props.Description: Restores {1} Morale (may exceed the maximum, but cannot be used if already above maximum).
props.Name: Exilir of Hope

props.Description: Removes up to {1} Poison counters.
props.Name: Antidote

props.Description: Removes up to {1} Disease counters.
props.Name: Palewood Extract

props.Description: Reduces target's Focus by 1 for every 5 Poison counters it has each turn. Adds {1} Poison counters to a chosen weapon, which will then be applied to targets upon successful attacks, with maximum depending on damage dealt, weapon type and hero's skills. Throwing weapons apply 5x times more counters and ranged weapons (use on ammo) - 2x.
props.Name: Hallucinogenic Poison

props.Description: Adds {1} Corrosion counters to a chosen weapon, which will then be applied to targets upon successful attacks, with maximum depending on damage dealt, weapon type and hero's skills. Throwing weapons apply 5x times more counters and ranged weapons (use on ammo) - 2x.
props.Name: Corrosive Coating

props.Description: Adds {1} Disease counters to a chosen weapon, which will then be applied to targets upon successful attacks, with maximum depending on damage dealt, weapon type and hero's skills. Throwing weapons apply 5x times more counters and ranged weapons (use on ammo) - 2x.
props.Name: Contamination Coating

props.Description: Adds {1} Blight counters to a chosen weapon, which will then be applied to targets upon successful attacks, with maximum depending on damage dealt, weapon type and hero's skills. Throwing weapons apply 5x times more counters and ranged weapons (use on ammo) - 2x.
props.Name: Blight Coating

props.Description: Reduces target's Initiative by 1 for each Poison counter it has every time it is about to act. Adds {1} Poison counters to a chosen weapon, which will then be applied to targets upon successful attacks, with maximum depending on damage dealt, weapon type and hero's skills. Throwing weapons apply 5x times more counters and ranged weapons (use on ammo) - 2x.
props.Name: Paralyzing Poison

props.Description: Applies Dispel {2} and removes {1} Essence from the target
props.Name: Spellbane Bomb

props.Description: Adds {1} Frost counters to a chosen weapon, which will then be applied to targets upon successful attacks, with maximum depending on damage dealt, weapon type and hero's skills. Throwing weapons apply 5x times more counters and ranged weapons (use on ammo) - 2x.
props.Name: Liquid Frost Coating

props.Description: Adds {1} Blaze counters to a chosen weapon, which will then be applied to targets upon successful attacks, with maximum depending on damage dealt, weapon type and hero's skills. Throwing weapons apply 5x times more counters and ranged weapons (use on ammo) - 2x.
props.Name: Liquid Fire Coating

props.Description: Target unit receives {1} Fire damage plus 2% per point of Throw Mastery and gets {2} Blaze counters.
props.Dev_Notes: Roll of attack*throw mastery vs defense? Cell will receive double amount of Blaze counters.
props.Name: Ensnaring Net
